response.data: {'Country Name': 'France', 'Languages': 'French (official) 100%, rapidly declining regional dialects and languages (Provencal, Breton, Alsatian, Corsican, Catalan, Basque, Flemish)', 'Language Codes': 'fr-FR,frp,br,co,ca,eu,oc'}

{'Country Name': 'Italy', 'Languages': "Italian (official), German (parts of Trentino-Alto Adige region are predominantly German-speaking), French (small French-speaking minority in Valle d'Aosta region), Slovene (Slovene-speaking minority in the Trieste-Gorizia area)", 'Language Codes': 'it-IT,de-IT,fr-IT,sc,ca,co,sl'}

{'Country Name': 'India', 'Languages': 'Hindi 41%, Bengali 8.1%, Telugu 7.2%, Marathi 7%, Tamil 5.9%, Urdu 5%, Gujarati 4.5%, Kannada 3.7%, Malayalam 3.2%, Oriya 3.2%, Punjabi 2.8%, Assamese 1.3%, Maithili 1.2%, other 5.9%', 'Language Codes': 'en-IN,hi,bn,te,mr,ta,ur,gu,kn,ml,or,pa,as,bh,sat,ks,ne,sd,kok,doi,mni,sit,sa,fr,lus,inc'}

{'Country Name': 'Afghanistan', 'Languages': 'Afghan Persian or Dari (official) 50%, Pashto (official) 35%, Turkic languages (primarily Uzbek and Turkmen) 11%, 30 minor languages (primarily Balochi and Pashai) 4%, much bilingualism, but Dari functions as the lingua franca', 'Language Codes': 'fa-AF,ps,uz-AF,tk'}

{'Country Name': 'Albania', 'Languages': 'Albanian 98.8% (official - derived from Tosk dialect), Greek 0.5%, other 0.6% (including Macedonian, Roma, Vlach, Turkish, Italian, and Serbo-Croatian), unspecified 0.1% (2011 est.)', 'Language Codes': 'sq,el'}

{'Country Name': 'Algeria', 'Languages': 'Arabic (official), French (lingua franca), Berber dialects: Kabylie Berber (Tamazight), Chaouia Berber (Tachawit), Mzab Berber, Tuareg Berber (Tamahaq)', 'Language Codes': 'ar-DZ'}

{'Country Name': 'United States', 'Languages': 'English 82.1%, Spanish 10.7%, other Indo-European 3.8%, Asian and Pacific island 2.7%, other 0.7% (2000 census)', 'Language Codes': 'en-US,es-US,haw,fr'}

{'Country Name': 'American Samoa', 'Languages': 'Samoan 90.6% (closely related to Hawaiian and other Polynesian languages), English 2.9%, Tongan 2.4%, other Pacific islander 2.1%, other 2%', 'Language Codes': 'en-AS,sm,to'}
{'Country Name': 'Argentina', 'Languages': 'Spanish (official), Italian, English, German, French, indigenous (Mapudungun, Quechua)', 'Language Codes': 'es-AR,en,it,de,fr,gn'}
{'Country Name': 'Turkey', 'Languages': 'Turkish (official), Kurdish, other minority languages', 'Language Codes': 'tr-TR,ku,diq,az,av'}
{'Country Name': 'Angola', 'Languages': 'Portuguese (official), Bantu and other African languages', 'Language Codes': 'pt-AO'}
